news.title: Lockdown could have been avoided and other key findings from Covid inquiry
news.summary: The long-awaited report is published into how well or badly the government handled the Covid pandemic.

news.title: Zelensky to speak with Trump after US proposes Russia-Ukraine peace plan
news.summary: The plan was reportedly drafted by US and Russian officials, without Ukraine's involvement.

news.title: Some migrants to face 20 year wait for settled status
news.summary: Shabana Mahmood says becoming part of the UK is "not a right but a privilege â€“ and one that must be earned".

news.title: Ice warnings spread across parts of UK gripped by cold snap
news.summary: New ice warnings were issued in Scotland, England and Wales for Friday, with the coldest night of the week expected on Thursday.

news.title: How bravery of two women led to 'monster' Met officer's conviction for more sex crimes
news.summary: David Carrick is already serving life in prison, but he now faces a further sentence.

news.title: Stone Roses and Primal Scream bassist Mani dies at 63
news.summary: Gary Mounfield's playing was an integral part of the Stone Roses' sound, and he was in Primal Scream for 15 years.

news.title: COP30 climate talks evacuated after fire breaks out
news.summary: Thousands of people are attending the UN climate talks in Brazil.

news.title: US broadcast regulator writes to BBC over Panorama edit of Trump speech
news.summary: The letter is reportedly also sent to the BBC's US partners, and seeks to find out if any US rules were broken.

news.title: Trans people could be barred from services based on appearance
news.summary: The new code of practice on access to single-sex services cannot gain legal force until it gets sign-off from ministers.

news.title: Wales host Bosnia and NI visit Italy in World Cup play-offs
news.summary: Wales will host Bosnia-Herzegovina and Northern Ireland travel to Italy in the  World Cup play-off semi-finals.
